content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2:15 am, i was standing out front of my job. and noticed a star??? that seemed to move in several directions. no great movement was noticed. but it was moving it would dip then lift, move left to right then right to left. i called a coworker from inside the store. and she also noticed the movement. another coworker was reporting for her shift. both myself and the first coworker asked her to take a look. she also noticed the movement. then break time was over. when i went back outside during my lunch break at 4:30 the object was gone. i called to the first coworker to take a look. there was nothing there but open dark space. it seriously looked like a star high in the night sky when i first noticed it. yet it was no longer there two hours later. there was nothing. i read earlier in the day on yahoo. the the military was launching three missiles on the east coast. and that nasa had spotted a star which they said was due to super nova. but no time line was given other that in out life time.
content.summary: Looked like a star in the sky. yet it would move left to right, up and down

content.detailedDescription: i'm not exactly certain about the year in which my ufo sighting had occurred, but it was likely 2007 because my daughter was about 9 years old at the time.  the one thing i am most certain about however is the exact day and time in which the sighting  had occurred because it was the summer solstice--the longest day of the year.  the sky was crystal clear outside which made it the perfect night for star gazing.  so,  in the late evening of june 21st, 2007 at approximately 10:00 pm, i grabbed my telescope and headed just outside the front door of my apartment complex where i was living at the time.  my nine year old daughter, even though it was past her bed time, i let tag along with me because  just like myself she has always been fascinated with astronomy.   my daughter headed out the front door first and i followed right behind.  i began to set up my telescope on the front lawn of the complex wile my daughter was gazing up in amazement at all the beautiful stars.   given that there was literally no cloud coverage or the usual smog coverage one would expect at that time of the year the stars were exceptionally visible that night.  suddenly, and excitedly my daughter screamed:  "daddy is that a fire fly in the sky?" at that moment i looked up and noticed an object flying overhead.  my mouth about dropped to the ground!  i was stunned!  i had never seen anything like it before. it was what appeared to be a brightly glowing light-orange colored orb, or sphere, which seemed to be moving at a tremendous speed across the night sky located somewhere between maybe 60 and 80 degrees from the southern facing horizon.  although the object was clearly a great distance away from us, i would have to say that if i had held a softball up in front of my face, it would be a good approximation of the size required to sufficiently block the flying object from my view. but, what amazed me most all about it was that it did not travel in a straight line like one would expect from a normal jet air craft or air plane passing over head, but rather like a pebble skipping across a pond, or perhaps a jittery insect such as a fire fly, etc. passing by.  but this was not an insect.  insects usually make a buzzing noise don't they?  but the object that i witnessed didn't make any noise at all, and furthermore as far as i know fire flies don't exist in california.  i had spent nine years of service in the united states air force and for part of that time, i was stationed in the mid-western united states.  sure i saw fire flies all the time out there in the mid-west but never have i seen any fire flies out here in california.  also during my nine years of military service, i have seen and witnessed almost every type  of  air craft i can imagine, but i have never seen an orange colored orb flying over an air force base before or anywhere for that matter.   the orb continued to fly almost due east toward the sierra nevada mountains and i kept my eyes locked on it until i couldn't see it anymore.  it must have flown completely over the mountains.  although the entire incident only lasted for about 30 to 60 seconds, it left an indelible impression on me.  to this day i still don't know what it was, but i would like to know.  is it possible that what i saw was actually the space shuttle still flying in orbit?  after all, the space shuttle did land at edwards air force base on june 22nd, only one day after i had witnessed the orange colored orb passing by my home, and that would certainly coincide with the easterly direction of the orange orb i had witnessed.  but what of the skipping motion of the orange orb passing by--could atmospheric anomalies make the space shuttle appear as if were skipping across water?  and, what of the orange glow, is that what the space shuttle looks like when its traveling above our atmosphere, just an orange glow?   and what of the incredible speed that it appeared to be moving.  it only took it perhaps 30 plus seconds to cross the entire valley area before it reached the mountains, is that the speed of the space shuttle?  and, did the space shuttle just by coincidence happen to be crossing near my home in that part of california at 10:00 pm on june 21st 2007?   if the answer to these questions in no, then i have to consider that what my daughter and i witnessed that night was not of this earth.
content.summary: It flew high above me extremely fast from west to east like a light-orange glowing fire fly then disappeared over the sierra nevada mountains

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i witnessed two gigantic orbs hover for 5 minutes next to each other dim out and come back on several times in the same spot. the color is like nothing i've ever seen flying in the sky also this is my second report. still have not got an answer for what these are. they aren't fireworks or planes/helicopters. they are everywhere and if they they are extraterrestrial they're trying to be seen. also seen them 1/14/14. an amazing sight to see.
content.summary: These orbs are everywhere. super bright orange and will just dim out. they are huge and stay informations usually i have witnessed just one but seeing them in the formations are truly amazing. what is going on

content.detailedDescription: My father and myself were on the way to the store and upon getting into the car we looked up and saw two glowing objects coming from the east and headed west.  we called my mother to come and take a look.  the best way to describe the objects is a bubble of fire.  these objects were moving slowly.  my father and i continued in the car to the store and saw 3 more of the same objects coming in the opposite direction.  from the store we saw the 3 objects merge with the other two which formed a v formation.  once the v was formed it appeared to have six of the glowing objects making the v.  we also observed a helicopter hovering and looking in the same direction of the objects. there were also people stopping in their cars to watch.  we watched the objects for about 9 minutes, went into the store and when we returned, they were gone.
content.summary: First saw two bright glowing objects comming from the east to west then saw 3 more comming in opposite direction and they seemed to merge into a v.

content.detailedDescription: Got out the house to go to work with the wife. noticed the star at sunrise. mile away we jump on the freeway and noticed it was a long vertical cigar shape. told wife she notices it too. as shes driving im telling her what its doin and she is checking and sees it change shape to a bright star like object. seems to be turning i see another light coming off the bright one (wife also sees it). so there are two light the one that came off gets faint and its gone but a second later it reappears and goes back to the light. see it get brighter and then less bright several times. then its bright and starts stretching to a horizontal cigar shape. then its starts going back to a bright star. then disappears. appears again but not so bright anymore. by the time i dropped her off around 815am i can no longer spot it. i tried to take a picture but too much movement in the car and i couldnt focus it on the light.
content.summary: Bight star, changed to cigar shape vert., changed to one and another light came off disappears and reappeares and units with other light, gets brighter and changes to cigar shape to horizontal, then back to star like, flickering. appears and disappears.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was 14 and at home.  at around 9 p.M. my mother came in and said very excitedly to come with them (her & my stepdad).  my stepfather was in the car waiting with it still running, when i got in they told me they had been on their way home to minerva from canton traveling east on route 30 when they saw two shapes in the sky.  they claimed to have pulled over and had watched them for about 15 minutes and decided to come get me to also witness.  i thought they were playing a joke on me.  we drove approx. 4 miles west on route 30 to the same spot they had pulled over to previously.  it was a small parking spot for a small engine repair & sales business.  at approx 9:15 p.M. while looking north the 2 items were immediately apparent and visible.  i made fun of them as on initial viewing they were just a couple of spotlights, then i thought they were just helicopters (this all in the first 10 seconds). then it was very very evident that what we were watching were not spotlights or helicopters.  the two craft that had been kind of going in a slow synchronized path stopped midair and in an instant shot straight up.  they reappeared more to the east, they were around 45ish degrees in the sky, looked to be around the size of a large helicopter or commuter plane.  they emitted an overall white yet not bright light, similar to a glow. the light was emitted from them.  we watched them for over an hour occupy a large area of the sky, go in and out of clouds, go far off and return closely.  they flew at times in a synchronized pattern at times close and far apart from each other.  they also flew in a seemingly individual style even at times very very far apart and even alone at time when one would go too distant or high for us to see. after about 1:15 minutes around 10:30ish they had been flying very rapidly they stopped, hovered, about 200 or so feet apart they hovered toward each other stopped and then in an instant shot up and were gone.  we stayed for about 45 minutes to see if we could see them again, they never reappeared.  during their time in the sky these glowing spheres made every conceivable type of maneuver.  they flew fast, slow, hovered, made abrupt directional changes.  my mother called the police when we got home, they told her they had received some calls already.  we didn't talk too much with other people about it, but we were all in agreement about what we had seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 2 spherical shapes seen hovering, changing direction & elevation.  flying in formation in both close & distant proximity as well as flying in non unison movement both close and far from each other

content.detailedDescription: The evening of the event it was around sundown there was still some day light left but not much. you could make out a star or two probably planets. the tempurture was around 75 or 80 degrees so i had all of my windows open airing out the house. i was watching television when my attention was turned to the increasing amount of noise coming from the wildlife out side, birds, incescts, dogs, and cats were absolutly going crazy. i muted the television and said to my self "what the hell is going on" so i walked out my fron door which faces north and as suddenly as the noise started it had stopped i glanced up to see a fast moving blue/white shimmering object accellerate up and away from the horizon on a curved path to me it was leaving our atmosphere. i have seen hundreds of meteors enter our atmosphere and i am 100% this was not a meteor, nor was it an aircraft of this planet.
content.summary: Fast moving blue/white ball of light ascending up at a curve

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the phone, walking around outside my house when i saw two metallic orbs flying over the treetops across the street from my house around sunset. the objects were hovering a dozen feet or so above the trees. the objects made no sound what so ever. they had no exterior lights, but were very reflective. they were moving at a speed of maybe 5-10 mph. they seemed to just barely move. there were traveling a few feet apart, and every few seconds the distance between the two would vary slightly. they reflected the setting sun, but i couldn't tell exactly what the surface was made of. the surface looked like highly polished silver; completely spherical. 

i watched the objects for 3-4 minutes, then decided to get my telescope for a closer look. it only took about 30 seconds to grab my telescope and come back to the front of the house. but by the time i got back out, the objects were gone. i looked all around, but could find no trace of them anywhere.

i live in the direct flight path of four airports; nashville international, murfreesboro airport, shelbyville airport, and smyrna airport. i am very familiar with comercial and military aircraft, as i see them everyday. but this was something altogether different. i can't honestly say "what" they were, but i know what they were not...
content.summary: 2 orb-like objects slowly flying over treetops. no sound

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving ne at night, on a rural road. there were high ceiling clouds and a near full moon, but the clouds made it fairly dark and few stars were observable. as we approached, i observed a green flashing light perpendicular to our path.  thinking it was an airplane, it got my attention as it seemed to be very close to the ground but was horizontal in its path. suddenly it changed directions very rapidly and went away from us in a sw direction, parallel to our path. when it changed directions it also changed colors, going from green to aqua to blue. i watched it until it disappeared. i then wondered it it were some sort of remote controlled device.  i was perplexed as to what i saw and only then asked my husband if he just saw what i saw. he recanted the same story but because he was driving he did not see it change colors.  he said nothing from this planet could structurally withstand the forces of the abrupt directional change and no remote controlled device could travel and turn at such. speed.  with that all we knew to do was to report it as a ufo sightings.
content.summary: Green light traveling nw makes very rapid, abrupt turn and goes sw

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This pic was sent to me by a friend just outside of roswell nm, 
he saw this image and had to stop to take a better look ..
this appears to be a classic "grey" alien image..
no actions, no motions other than cloud shift, the image didn't shift..
"the first thing that came to my mind."  "are we being watched" ?
we just sat on the hood of the car, snapped a pic, the image just hung there so we eventually drove away with it still there.....

  i don't claim or suggest know what this is, just passing it along..
content.summary: Photo of

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting down on my porch step smoking a cigarette when suddenly out of nowhere a white round object came into my view on my northeast. i witnessed it hovering there silently emitting internal white light for about ten to fifteen minutes when i walked towards it, trying to get a better view of it. at this point, it started moving silently to my west and literally turned into some sort of airplane. i know how rare of a sighting this is because in all of my own personal research, i've maybe once read about a morphing ufo. in retrospect, it was almost like this object knew it was spotted and tried to convince us, whoever else may have witnessed it, that it was nothing more than a conventional airplane. i also feel compelled to say that this object appeared right over top of where cattle are raised on this farm close to my house. and days leading up to this event, the cattle had been making the worse noises i've ever heard any cattle ever make. my father was also a witness to this event, i should add. during the event, i felt an array of emotions. mostly i was excited but afterwards, i came out of it with an uneasiness emotionally. i do believe that these beings have some sort of attraction to cattle, whether it's for their organs, blood, etc. it's eerie to me because in actuality, i don't think there's any question on the legitimacy of these objects any longer. we know they're here. we know that more and more people are coming out of the closet to disclose their own personal experiences with these beings, including abductions, which in my opinion, are one hundred percent real and ongoing. from researching psychiatrists like john mack and budd hopkins, i don't think there's any question on the nature of abductions which include a precise interest on breeding. what puzzles me is why the breeding program? what is the end game for these hybrid beings? we need answers, and now. thank you for allowing me to disclose my personal experience with this object.
content.summary: I first noticed this white, round object that looked like a giant orb, silently hovering. after hovering for about ten minutes, the object changed direction and shape. it literally changed shape from an orb into a weird looking triangular aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: What wee saw was not a flying object it was a light in the sky  abeam of light came out of the sky like when you shine a torch on you can see the beem of light ? like that then it came towards us the light came ouy off the sky on to the dirt road from above us it lasted for about a minute and wee al ran away wee al speack about it to each uther but people think uwe ar nut,s
content.summary: It was a beam of light in the sky witch then made striaght toward me and my friends then stopt in the middle of the dirt road next to the dam wee wher swimming in .

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and looked up at the moon and noticed right away the big bright object seemed way to close to the moon to be a star. i live in antelope , ca  the date is 1/14/2014 and i noticed this at about 7:48. i keep going out side to make sure im seeing the same shape and movement of the object.When i first noticed i thought maybe and odd position of a star but this was too big/close and moved around very odd like. seeems like it was in some sort of an off axis spin. along with this odd spin im noticing that it is moving back and forth. it even stopped moving at one point then started up again. while starring at this object very close and looking at it from different angles i kept seeing a very acute shaped triangle form. the triangle appeared for long enough time for it to be a definite triangle before spinning out of view. it never stops producing a strong bright light just only shows the triangle every so many minutes. i just went back outside and it is 8:47 pm this object is doing the same exact thing and seems to be following the moon as moon moves. my personal feeling was a rational reason had to be looked at before i can let myself believe its something its not. so ran inside and checked online for anything relating. and the only thing i could find was a report from someone who lives in grass valley had reported seeing the same thing i was seeing.It could easily be seen from here and there at the same time. i have never reported any type of sighting in my life. i do pay a lot attention to this subject much closer now beginning a year ago. i truly believe this object doesn't belong there and seems very strange. i will keep looking at this the rest of the night as long as i can. i have no estimate to when it will stop or i will lose sight.
content.summary: At around 8 pm i was looking at the moon. very clear sky. there is a very bright shape moving back and forth and seems like its in a spin of sorts due to it revealing a very definite triangle shape that continues to appear . shown best by moon reflection.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight around 7, my best friend and i we're driving through town when a very large, very bright blue/white light flashed above us. it looked like the white led lights with the  bluish tint. it appeared all of 2 seconds if that. it was so bright i had to close my eyes and i kind of ducked when i saw it.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were headed back from brandon mb to waskada mb. we got to the edge of town and stopped at the stop sign and noticed a bright object in the sky. our first impression was that it was strange and did not belong, no thoughts of a plane came to mind. we pulled over and got out to try and get a better view. object was seen hovering then moved south about 5 degrees as per our view looking west, it disappeared for about 30 seconds and reappeared about 10 degrees to the north and hovered there, disappeared again and appeared to the south about 5 degrees and reappeared about the same spot we first seen it. we proceeded to look at it for about 5 more minutes when i actually thought to take a picture. it was way brighter then anything in the sky, not in any clouds and it was in daylight. after taking the pictures we observed it for another 5 minutes, hovering stationary. it made us feel uneasy even a bit scared. for some reason we left with the object still there, took no more photos and went home. as we were driving south into town (about 300 m) the object started to move south as well. we turned east onto a street and went home. once at home i looked for it but the trees blocked my view and honestly we didn't want to see it anymore.
content.summary: Bright strange object in sky, daytime and photos.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out the front door of my house to go to the local mason lodge. i looked up (as i always do)and saw a bright red-orange orb. i knew immediately that it was not a normal aircraft; we live near an airport and have seen numerous aircraft at night over the years. \

since i had locked the door behind me, i banged on the door so my wife and daughter could come see it. about ten seconds later they came out and witnessed it too. they too realize that it was no normal aircraft.

i yelled to them to run and get our cameras with telephoto zoom. although i have no way to judge speed, it moved rather quickly in a straight line heading north northwest.

while they were running to get our cameras, i snapped one picture with my cell phone. a few seconds later they came out with our zoom cameras. by that short amount of time, however, the object had moved too far away and was too dim (probably due to cloud cover) for us to even attempt at getting a decent picture. 

as it was traveling towards the north northwest, it did appear that the object was ascending, but that could have just been an optical illusion of it flying into the clouds and getting fainter. the entire episode probably did not last much longer than a minute.  all three of us were in amazement and still are tonight as i type this report.

i've attached my cell phone photo to this report just for documentation purposes, but the slow shutter speed my cell phone used to take the shot made the object appear to have a couple of tails. it does, however, represent the color fairly accurately.
content.summary: Red-orange glowing orb, appeared to have a subtile pulsating to it.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving homepassed small airport clouds looked strang to me so i pulled over.When i got out of car started taking pictures of clouds when i seen an object just the left of the sun started taking pictures. a week later after looking at my pictures of grand baby forgot abot the pic.W hen they came up there was a green orb next to clouds lokked like a planet have four of them.
content.summary: Was comming home passed little airport and seen strang clouds got out to take pics with cell phone seen object took pictures

content.detailedDescription:
I couldnt sleep in the early hours on december 11th, between 3:30am and 6:30am. i was sitting on my sofa using my laptop with my new phone handy - a galaxy note3. i have a large picture window with two side windows at the southwestern end of my living room. i was sitting on the sofa perpendicular to those windows. above my large picture window with side windows, there is yet another window, higher (15 or so inches). this window extends the length of the side windows and picture window. (the window that i took my pictures out of above the picture window is 91 inches across and about 18 or more inches high. i happened to look toward the window and up to the very top this bright object caught my eye.  it was an extremely bright object with what looked like several rod extensions projecting from it like a tripod, the same color and intensity of display as the main object. i simply decided to pick up my phone and began snapping images. i had no idea my phone would even capture any pictures. until maybe 4 or 5 days later did i realize it had when i checked and found them, much to my surprise. 

this was not the first time, i had seen this type of image. a few days before, i saw it in the same area (only one object) but at a lower elevation. i watched it around 3-4am for a very long time.

late last summer, i saw two of these lights. i did not think to take pictures of this event. one was hovering in and around and yet in the same area as the others i have seen recently, over the rooftops, where i live. the second was hovering northwest and seemed to be over and around our international airport. i watched them glide around, especially object #2 positioned over the airport, as it went up and down, but only slightly.  again, they were seen in the early morning hours around 3am.  object #1 moved smoothly and slowly up and down, as well as hover. i never saw them leave; they just disappeared, as did the other times, i mentioned above. i may have not noticed them leaving.

when i checked my pictures taken through the window, i found only one that was colored. it was a bright orange red image. all the others were white images.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright object hovering at different levels in sky over houses and near anchorage international airport. observed different elevations of hovering and just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a green and purple saucer looking objet hovering over a farm house as i drove home from work on vint hill rd in virginia.
content.summary: Looked like a green and purple flying object.  maybe it was somekind of remote control device, but really expensive and large if so.

content.detailedDescription: It was on or about 6:10am me and my son were leaving our home to walk him down our driveway to wait for his bus, on our way my son pointed out what first looked like a large star (traveling east) and faster than a plane but obviously that wouldn't make any sense unless maybe it was a meteor (it was not) as we are watching it for about 5-7 seconds , it began to pulsate very bright. it did so three times , the third time was the brightest before descending straight to the ground at a much higher speed. it was almost like there was already a light or hole? on the ground that it descended to or entered into and left a splash like light. i may also note that the area it descended to was on or near i70 interstate.
content.summary: Seen a ufo traveling east then decend to the ground leaving a trail and splash or light admission

content.detailedDescription:
I was out late at night watching persieds meteor shower on my parents back on water street in hudson. was between 2am-3am. was sitting in recliner facing south. there is a little city light interference in the sky. water street is only about 3 blocks north of downtown.  i was scanning the sky douth and west for meteors since this was best view of the sky at water street. something large was decending rapidly at a 45degree angle. no lights just metallic looking beacause the city lights were reflecting of its surface. was heading south to north and looked like it was flying parallel to us 127 less than a mile west of my location. it was about tree top level and a bright beam of light came out of its surface pointing directly at the ground. from my location the line of trees is a block west of my location. the object look like it was 1/4 mile west if these trees still decending with beam of light. this object was very near the taylor pony farm (vetenierian farm) on us 127 another name for this road is north meridian road
. i knew it wad near this farm is because i could hear the horses from 1/2 mile away sounding like they were in a panic. when horse make the vocal sounds when they are scared. i could hear the horses for about 20 seconds. but the craft had went behind the trees so i lost sight of it from my location. don't know if it continued north
or hovered in the field over the horses at the veterinarian hospital.  i wanted to get in my car and drive down to the area i seen it but frankly was a lootle excited and scared at what i heard (horses) and seen. object had no lights except beam and no sound was heard from it.The next day i really wanted to stop or call the taylor pony farm to see if anything the night before woke any of the residence up but never did.
content.summary: metallic like craft projected beam down over taylor pony farm on us 127. heard horses panic.

content.detailedDescription: Observed from my balcony on the 7th floor ocean front.  approx. 6:30 pm walked out on balcony and observed a series of 3 orange flare like globes in the northeast sky.  they were moving like they were being launched from north to south.  they lasted for approx. 3-5 seconds and disappeared.  there were numerous twinkling star like lights on the east horizon which moved in no apparent pattern.  then approx. 15 minutes later there was another launch of orange globes this time directly in front of the condo in the eastern sky.  there were a number of globes maybe 7-10 and they disappeared within 3-5 seconds of observation.  the twinkling star like lites moved from the eastern horizon to the west overhead.  a boat well lit appeared in the northeast and travelled in a southerly direction.  approx. 10 minutes passed the was another launch of orange globes in the south eastern sky maybe 6-10 of them disappearing within 3-5 seconds.  the twinkling lights disappeared then we observed approx. 8 larger star like lights that moven in a straight line blinking white lites from the south eastern horizon in a westerly direction overhead and continued until the view of the sky was obstructed by the condo building next door.  the star like lights were well below the stationary stars overhead and flew two by two without wavering in their pattern.  i called the local tv station wpde and reported the lites asking if there was a military operation in the area.  the lady i spoke to said she was unaware of any operations and would look into the matter.  at this point i started to feel really foolish but i am not the only one that observed this the other person with me insists on remaining anonamous,  i would like to know what i did observe.  there were no sounds made by the objects.
content.summary: First observed orange flare like globes then twinkling lights then more orange flares like globes then the twinkling lights turned into blinking lights and flew

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back patio w/my mom when she said to me do you see that and i said yes omg what is that.My mom brought it to my attention. it looked like the sun but a lil smaller and brighter orange.It was going at a slower pace then a plane then it hovered then flashed a bright light then kept going then disappeared.I ran from the back of the house to the front of the house to see it.It just disappeared.
content.summary: I was in amazement never seen anything like it before bright orange round object flying thru the sky and hover then take off and dissappear into the clear night...

content.detailedDescription:
Detras de un avion  observe  una esfera  que lo seguia  en un cielo sin nubes y en segundos se hizo invisible sin tiempo  para tomar foto  aunque hubiera tenido camara  a mano. esto lo informe por emal  a  la  cia  y no obtuve  respuesta  aunque les dije estaba dispuesto  y lo estoy a pasar un  examen neuro psiquiatrico  y pasar por el detector de mentira
no tengo  ningun comentario que  hacerles
esto  ocurrio  sobre  el aeropuerto  de miami
1- estaba en mi carro  parado frente al aeropuerto de miami
2- solo observaba  aviones  sin pensar  en ovnis
3- pense que fuera un  ovnis
4- la esfera volaba en linea recta  detgras  del  avion  a unos  50 m
5- a mi nada  me  asombra  ni me intimida  en la vida  intente comunicar lo visto a un ufologo  pero no encontre ninguna direccion  por lo que  de cidi infoforma  a la  cia   por  el  lugar estrategico donde volaba
6-perdi  de ver la esfera  en  segundos  aunque  continuaba viendo alo avion
content.summary: Sphera de color igual  al avion que  seguia y desaparecion en segundos

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday night, 1/11/14, approx. 8:30-9:30 pm (pdt), i was staring at the moon and noticed a bright light below and towards the left of the moon which i thought perhaps was a falling star, comet, plane or satellite. the light continued moving forward then stopped for a few seconds and made a hard turn left and upwards towards the moon from the perspective i was viewing. it continued left then stopped. i continued to observe the stationary light for at least 5 minutes, in which time i needed to step back into my kitchen to finish cooking.

i live in grass valley, ca. did anyone else in my area see this?
content.summary: While looking at the moon i noticed a bright object with a path and directional change which then remained stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was driving towards lytle tx on fm 3175 .I saw stationary green light to the south of me . it started to descend so i thought falling star but it was speeding up . when it got closer towards the ground it took a curved 90 degree turn and took off at a speed that is faster than anything i had ever seen before. it took off so fast at a south west direction that it just went out of sight . my daughter was with me and she could tell that i had seen something abnormal . i did talk to another person that saw the same thing i did
content.summary: Hovered then descended - sped up and turned and took off at high speed

content.detailedDescription: One light appeared above treetop changing directions and blinking rapidly, after about a minute it stopped.
content.summary: Flashing lights that changed direction rapidly then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was putting my baby in the car and noticed something shining in the clouds. i watched the craft move in and out of the clouds going sideways. then it would stop and hover start shining again and go back into the clouds. it seemed like it would go backwards in the clouds because the clouds were moving but that craft would come back out in the same spot it went into the clouds. every time it started moving towards the clouds the bright light would go away. and it seemed like the whole craft would glow not just a few lights on it. when it would come back out of the clouds it would be dark colored kinda like the clouds. i watched it for about 7-10 minutes and then it went into the clouds and didn't come back out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The craft was going sideways into clouds and coming out sideways.

content.detailedDescription: On my way home passing by my grandmas house i notice a non blinking blue and red light flying slow then just completely stop and hoover over the sky.I knew it was a ufo so i pulled over and tried to take pic and video but my phone isnt that good it was to dark out.As i stared at it it started to decend down towards the ground but behind what looked to be some tall trees behind some house. i tried to circle around the block but could not tell where it landed but i saw no more lights.Also it never made any noise at all,it was a little scary to witness something like that.
content.summary: All i needed to see to believe

content.detailedDescription: If you watch the nasa series. "when we left earth" during the shuttle episode at min 28 you will get a great look yourself.
content.summary: During challenger explosion small metal ball seemed to dart in and look at the disaster and change course.
